text: Ammonium is an ion. It is an ammonia molecule, NH3, protonated (with a hydrogen ion added) to make NH4+. It bonds with negative ions such as chloride to make salts such as ammonium chloride. Ammonium is slightly reducing so it can react with strong oxidizing agents. ==References== ==Related pages== *Ammonium chloride *Ammonia *Protonation *Hydrogen Category:Nitrogen compounds Category:Onium ions
title: Ammonium
